definitions.definition: A grating ; a grid of wire or a sheet of material with a pattern of holes or slots, usually used to protect something while allowing the passage of air and liquids . Typical uses: to allow air through a fan while preventing fingers or objects from passing; to allow people to talk to somebody, while preventing attack .
The criss-cross pieces that separate panes of glass in a window .
On a vehicle , a slotted cover as above, to protect and hide the radiator , while admitting air to cool it.
( UK ) A cooking device comprising a source of radiative heat and a means of holding food under it; a broiler in US English
( US ) A cooking device comprising a source of radiative and convective heat and a means of holding food above it; a barbecue .
examples: I put some peppers and mushrooms on the grill to go with dinner.

definitions.definition: Food (designed to be) cooked on a grill.
examples: a packet of frozen cauliflower cheese grills

definitions.definition: A grillroom ; a restaurant serving grilled food.
examples: These coupons will get you a discount at Johnny's Bar and Grill .

definitions.definition: ( colloquial ) A type of jewelry worn on the front teeth.
( colloquial , by extension ) The front teeth regarded collectively.
( Internet slang , humorous ) Deliberate misspelling of girl .
